nodes.text: The Bitthævrian were a group whose homeworld was Guiteica. Warlords of the Kaleesh species historically took the creatures known as roggwarts as trophies from the Bitthævrian homeworld.

In the new Star Wars canon, the Bitthævrian were first mentioned in the sixty-fifth issue of the Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published in 2016. The Bitthævrian sentient species was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Alliance Intelligence Reports, sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game published in 1995.
